title: Phones getting hot using LTE
content: First the phone shows a message saying my system was out of date, when I clicked on check updates the phone will keep a loop on staying Device is up to date/preparing for update and keeps found round and round and won't stop. After that when I try to check for updates y keeps stuck. After it does that the phone gets hotter than normal and battery will drain quickly. I have found that resetting the phone helps but I have done it three times and still does that.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
